short_summary: Department of National Defence seeks three self-contained snow blower units.
description: The department has a requirement to procure quantity three self-contained snow blowers. Deliveries are requested to various Canadian bases within 120 days of contract award.
full_summary:
=================
### Self Contained Snow Blowers Tender Notice
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)
Publish Date: November 8, 2022
Close Date: January 5, 2023, at 13:00 hours

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to participate in the procurement of Self Contained Snow Blowers. Three (3) units are required for delivery to various Canadian military bases with a delivery date of 120 days from contract award.

The procurement is open to all qualified suppliers and is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers are encouraged to provide proposals in either English or French.

### Key Selection Criteria
* Delivery of Self Contained Snow Blowers to Canadian military bases
* Compliance with the quantity, quality, and delivery requirements outlined in the solicitation package
* Mandatory requirements as outlined in Annex A of the solicitation package

### Procurement Method
Competitive, open bidding will be used to select the successful supplier. Proposals will be evaluated based on the best overall value to the Crown.

### Trade Agreements
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPPA)

### Delivery Locations
Self Contained Snow Blowers will be delivered to various Canadian military bases in Alberta and Ontario, excluding National Capital Region.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Kevin Selim
kevin.selim@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-6473

### Attachments
The RFP package includes the following attachments:
* Annex A: Requirement
* Annex B: Basis of Payment
* Original RFP document
* Amendment 1
* Amendment 2

 Suppliers can access the RFP package via the Canadian Government’s tendering website, Canada Buys. [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) EV ]LTI=(ew reality preprocess!/£)\(
